text: Lux Occulta is an Polish avant-garde metal band formed in 1994. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Forever Alone, Immortal (1996) * Dionysos (1997) * My Guardian Anger (1999) * The Mother and the Enemy (2001) * Ko≈Çysanki (2014) ==References== Category:Progressive metal bands Category:Polish musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 1994 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2002
